channel.title: Hello Again
channel.description:
Hello again guys, 3 months after I was banned, I'm coming back. (Not to stay, just to make this post / browse around)
My old alias was: Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
I was banned because someone else made an account called "Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS_" and some mod just supposed it was me and decided to ban me permantly. (Not cool by the way, check the IPs)
Don't mock me for making this statement, but MoparScape, of all truths and will, was the best RSPS programming website I've ever visited. Compared to R0ne-Server (know it all zone) and RuneL0cus (idiot fest) this community seemed to be most mature.
Well now that I am IP banned from here, R0ne-Server for realeasing skillcape emotes, and Locus for crashing 2speced, I will be leaving the RSPS era for good.
There is no reason for me to continually developing servers if I cannot realease them anywhere, so without further adue, please enjoy my last release, a 525 as stable as Hyperion. Based off z508 - yes I know what you will say, it's very lag prone, and disconnects users randomly. I've fixed that. I've also converted the entire server's process to Graham's event managing framework, excluding packet processing (in which were meant to be in process in the first place, and ONLY them.)
Do whatever, ban me some more, IP ban me. I havn't done anything to be banned in the first place.
Goodbye RSPS, Hello LIFE.
- Canownueasy

item.title: Hello Again
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Legacy 525, post:1, topic:332244”]My old alias was: Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS

  • Canownueasy[/quote]

So you are also canownyoueasy, I remember you.


Most recent IP address:
    67.84.81.96 
IPs used in messages:
    174.121.12.2, 216.245.202.34, 67.84.81.96 
IPs used in error messages:
Members possibly in the same range:
    sir 711, UNBAN CANOWNUEASY

Proves you have multiple accounts, although they are not the accounts you thought you were banned for.

Regardless of any of the above evidence though you admittedly broke the rules to make the account that you are currently posting on.

Banned.

Read full topic

item.title: Hello Again
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:12, topic:332244”][quote author=Jamie1200 link=topic=428684.msg3146995#msg3146995 date=1268170595]

Hello again guys, 3 months after I was banned, I’m coming back.

and

Well now that I am IP banned from here, R0ne-Server for realeasing skillcape emotes, and Locus for crashing 2speced, I will be leaving the RSPS era for good.[/quote]

contradict each other, do they not?

(Not to stay, just to make this post / browse around) notice the information supplied.

Your truly one of the most idiotic people i have ever encountered

You have no right to say that? Hmm what have you released? Thought so. Canownueasy is incredibly talented when it comes to programming.

LOL at your sig. 1000 posts nice man!

I give a fuck why? I have every right to say that, talented or not, that doesn’t excuse the fact he is still an idiot.

Talented - Smart (in terms of programming)[/quote]

Idiotic - Fool. (in terms of stfu)

Read full topic
